Hiruko used [[Chimera Technique|strange viscous liquid]] in his surrounding during the eclipse immortality ritual. He's able to manipulate the viscosity of the liquid, so he can control it. The movement of the liquid is similar to a metal spring. These chunks of liquid can hit an enemy with enough force to temporarily knock them out.

[[pt-br:Aríete de Lodo Ultra-Viscoso]]
